--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Chad Bohannan" <chad@b...> wrote:
> Tylers Evolveing Humans presents a very easy use interface with a 
visual
> of the evaluation process. If you want to see a network evolve over
> time, that is the best software package I've seen. 

Tyler's program is indeed very cool.  Also if you haven't yet you 
should also check out Mattias' Hopper:

http://www.cambrianlabs.com/Mattias/Evolved/NEATHopper.asp

It even lets you see the current champion's network as evolution 
progresses, in addition to a similar option to Tyler's way of 
looking at the evolved behavior as it evolves.

ken
